name: Space Odyssey (itch) (5STAR)
description:
Hello everyone, Space Odyssey is a game that our team 5STAR been working on as a class project and is finally ready as a playable protoype! 

The point of the game is to traverse across 2 levels full with flying and ground enemies to make your way to the boss battle in the 3rd and last level. 

It's fast paced and fun to play, check it out and let us know how you like it. 

Thanks for checking our game out! 

Giant thank you to the whole team for working hard to make this happen.
